sentences.en: Orion had the habit of staring motionlessly at his interlocutor.
sentences.cn: 奥利恩有个一动不动地盯着谈话对象的习惯。

sentences.en: At first smile and maintain visual contact with the interlocutor.
sentences.cn: 首先，对你的谈话对象保持微笑，并与他保持眼神的交流。

sentences.en: In each case, the interlocutor inquires of the viewer, "What might this be?"
sentences.cn: 每一个个案中，询问者都会问观看者，“这可能是什么呢？”
